data.convo: Your request for compensation makes me surprised . What happened ? It is because of the quality . Could you tell me the particulars ? I told you that we want first-class goods . So the quality , specification and price are clarified in our contract . Do you remember those details ? Yes , I do . The re-examination results indicate that one-third of the goods are not up to standard . Really ? We began to load the goods after we made sure they were qualified . I told you the truth . According to the contract , if you fail to honor the contract , we are entitled to cancel it .
